column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The problem with hype lies within itself. In dating I equate it to this: you fancy the pants off somebody (because
column3: they are awesome) but they kinda know they're awesome
column4: so they make you an deep dish pizza that is... pizza. That might seem harsh (non-sequitur)
column5: especially since my expectations is what's at fault here. I had heard great things about Lou's pizza
column6: flew in from LA to try a classic Chicago Deep Dish staple
